title: @Reav3 What would you say on a Kassadin Malzahar dual VGU in the very far future?
body: Seeing you confirmed {{champion:131}} {{champion:89}}  for dual VGU where {{champion:131}} gets the larger changes and {{champion:89}} only VU, how about this two archnemesis? {{champion:38}} looks terrible, I think he only got texture update, same as {{champion:90}}, and they have potential too to deliver their rivalry properly.

replies.body:
I love how much everyone is investing in this. There's not actually that much lore surrounding Kassadin and Malzahar, at all... and yet they are now being heralded as one of the greatest rivalries in League!

This is a story I would love for us to tell. The narrative groundwork is already laid out.
Is Kassadin ever going to meet his daughter?

Kassadin's daughter was lost along with his wife. If either of them had _somehow_ survived after all these years, that would fundamentally change who he is, as a person... and how he views the world... and what he has done since then...

{{champion:50}} "So he's heard the rumors; the girl who came back"
Immediately followed by {{champion:145}} release

:thonk:
Yes indeed. I imagine someone who was in such close proximity to lands plagued by Void incursion and "the Prophet" would be able to hear such rumors...
It now makes sense that Kai'Sa isn't his daughter. After all, she's got a South African accent, he does not.

I mean, in the English version of the game, sure...

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I'm not understanding, so Kai sa was brought into the game but the lore team pretty much thinks it's better to keep Kai sa and Kassadin as if she never came back? 

I can understand why you guys did this but I'm genuinely asking if this is the thought process.
No, it's just not confirmed anywhere that Kai'Sa is in any way related or linked to Kassadin.

I will have to disagree. Kai'Sa special interactions with kassadin makes it way too obvious for it to not be confirmed... You guys are way too smart and wouldn't have put those special interactions if she wasn't her daughter.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OsCmTq-Hr7Q
Yeah the Quote kind of gives it away that they are indeed related.

Indeed! The new-and-improved lore definitely adds some depth and nuance to that, but it's going to be fun to explore it a lot more in future.

As opposing view I don’t find it interesting. There is a lack of something like a bit of spice... my favourite rivalries are 

Jhin vs Zed vs Shen
Kayle vs Morgana 
Jayce vs Viktor
Miss Fortune vs Gangplank
Jinx vs Vi if that counts

I wanted to say that maybe it’s because it’s not personal as I don’t care for Swain vs Irelia or Garen vs Darius since those two rivalries can pretty much be summed up in nationalistic terms. Then again Malzahar did screw over Kassadin’s daughter so it does come into personal territory. But the rivalry is lacking a little oomph still.
need a dual rework for {{champion:11}} {{champion:62}}

Sure, but so far you haven't talked about it, and when we ask, just seem to cause more confusion.
That's his job mate, leave it be. They will reveal stuff when they are able to, most likely through stories and other published content.

Indeed. I'm not going to spoiler any potential future content just to respond to board posts...

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I'm not mad for writers saying they can't spoil. I'm mad when they seem to intentionally cause confusion for people asking questions for clarity.

If "there's more to be told," then that means that there is likely some lore in development that will answer your question, and he isn't allowed to spoil stuff that Riot intends to reveal through upcoming lore.

He's not intentionally causing confusion. He's just avoiding answering questions that he's not allowed to answer.

> On a tangential note, I am more and more annoyed each new time you dismiss yet another remark with a "joke". Geez.

Ritual sacrifices. It's a big thing in lovecraftian fiction, since the magic in his fiction was often alien and required horrific sacrifices.

It's also possible that the knife was based on the [Kirpan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kirpan), one of the articles Sikh's are supposed to carry at all times. I believe Malzahar was religious or some sort of prophet in his lore, I don't know if that's still true though.

Remember OG Malzahar was almost literally advertised as, "The dark maniacal sorcerer looking for sacrificial victims". You might be able to find the original quote on the wiki but it's something like that. Can't have sacrifices without your trusty murder knife now can you?

For Malzahar, I'd like to see a new passive that plays on his future sight. All I've been able to come up with are Certainly T levels of bullshit so far. Things like a warning when someone you can't see is approaching, being able to see exact timers on enemy summoners, etc
Hold up when did they they are reworking {{champion:89}} and {{champion:131}} I’m not complaining I just want to see the post is all.
I think they only said they were open to the possibility of a dual vgu for Leona and Diana.
Kassadin has received a full VU in the past actually, his old model looked so horribly squat and clunky.. but ya malzahar was only given texture updates during the mage class update.

Probably because she's been useless as an assassin for the past several years if I had to guess. It's not just a numbers issue either because her gameplay is just "Did I hit Q? Yes > go in / No >  try again".

I think it's more of because she's meant to be an AP Bruiser that builds a damage item into tank and thus would play similarly to, say, {{champion:254}} or {{champion:59}} in teamfights, but her playstyle has almost always been purely assassin based, so they could rework her to fit Bruiser play more.

Not sure how likely that is to happen if AP Bruisers don't really have any items, though, since almost all of the items that would be close equivalents to {{item:3078}}, the {{item:3077}} line, and {{item:3022}} are general mage items anyway, or are otherwise non-existant. (There's more examples than this, but I hope these ones get the point across)
Too bad she's a Diver not an Assassin :)
Yes. So Kassadin can finally become the most badass chsracter in lore.
Kassadin vs Malzahar would be cool, but Viktor vs Jayce would be even better.
